channel.title: Susan Sontag on thedubiousmonk
channel.description: Recent content in Susan Sontag on thedubiousmonk

item.title: aggression
item.description: “Images which idealize (like most fashion and animal photography) are no less aggressive than work which makes a virtue of plainness (like class pictures, still lifes of the bleaker sort, and mug shots). There is an aggression implicit in every use of the camera.” On Photography - Susan Sontag I take pictures of my kid every day almost. He’s young; this kind of behaviour is expected. I do it now because when he ages into being able to give consent he might not want me to.
